Desc.entry: Private residential care home for elderly people aged 65 years and over, with an Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) facility. Provides 40 beds and a respite room. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
